item.title: My Year in Startup Hell
item.description:
My Year in Startup Hell

Just like the Binary Options industry… smart young things, working for a pittance, either convinced that they are making the world a better place, or cynical enough to keep up the facade of being so.

item.title: Kakonomics - The incentive for mediocrity
item.description:
Kakonomics - The incentive for mediocrity

Surely a first step in combating mediocrity is identify its causes - including admitting that there are often real incentives for mediocrity.

item.title: The Grid | AI Websites That Design Themselves
item.description:
The Grid | AI Websites That Design Themselves

OK. I GET IT!

item.title: Use Imaging to Enhance Robotic Capabilities | DigiKey
item.description:
Use Imaging to Enhance Robotic Capabilities | DigiKey

It’s amazing how fast technology moves towards the consumer space… now Lidar (which is basically echo-sensing, but with light) arrives, promising cameras that see depth by measuring the time-of-flight.

item.title: Coca-Cola's clever new trick
item.description:
Coca-Cola's clever new trick

A few years back, I identified that “plumbing” was a hands-on-engineering skill that I lacked. A few projects later, the lack was gone.It might be time to admit that “marketing” is a knowledge-work engineering skill that I lack… and to do the same.

item.title: Why I Lit Up Lytro - Backchannel
item.description:
Why I Lit Up Lytro - Backchannel

Scrapping the strategy may be the hardest choice a CEO ever has to make A little over a year ago at Lytro, it became clear to me that we needed to drastically change the direction of our company. We'd already built two generations of consumer Light Field cameras and were deep into development on our third and fourth generation models.

item.title: I'm being chased around the internet by a shed | Stuart Heritage
item.description:
I'm being chased around the internet by a shed | Stuart Heritage

A few weeks ago, I thought about buying a shed. I thought about buying a shed, and it was the most exciting thing I did that day, because I'm a hot-rod rebel and my entire life is a thrill-a-minute joyride of unimaginable debauchery.
